name: cmstekknews
description: The CMS Tekk News Blog application is a CMS-style blog site similar to a Wordpress site, where developers can publish their blog posts and comment on other developersâ€™ posts as well. This application is completely built from scratch and deployed to Heroku. This app followed the MVC paradigm in its architectural structure, using Handlebars.js as the templating language, Sequelize as the ORM, and the express-session npm package for session authentication.
author: nell-e
